StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetShipView]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @Star.ngRow int, @PageSize int, @FromDate date.me, @ToDate date.me, @OrgID int, @SortBy int ) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @now date.me SET @now = getdate()
--This will return one more row that they asked for so that they know if there is another page of data. DECLARE @LastRow int SET @LastRow = @Star.ngRow + @PageSize
-- Get data .ltered by SHIP_DATE and Org DECLARE @FilterTable TABLE ( SHIP_DATE date.me NULL, CONTRACT_ID int NULL, DATE_OF_ENLIST date.me NULL, COMPONENT_CODE varchar(2) NULL, NWA_ID int NULL, PERSON_ID int NULL, RSS varchar(62) NULL, TIER varchar(5) NULL ) INSERT INTO @FilterTable SELECT s.SHIP_DATE, c.CONTRACT_ID, c.MEPS_CONTRACT_DATE, c.COMPONENT_CODE, n.NWA_ID, n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, rss.[NAME], CASE dbo.GetTier(n.EDUCATION_CODE, c.MEPS_CONTRACT_DATE,n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID) WHEN 1 THEN 'I' WHEN 2 THEN 'II' WHEN 3 THEN 'III' END AS TIER FROM SHIPPER s WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CONTRACT c ON s.CONTRACT_ID = c.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN NWA n on c.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID INNER JOIN [USMC].[vwRecrui.ngOrgIDs] vw ON n.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = vw.root INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION rss ON vw.RSS = rss.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE s.SHIP_DATE >= @FromDate AND s.SHIP_DATE <= @ToDate AND (vw.RS = @OrgID OR vw.RSS = @OrgID OR vw.District = @OrgID OR vw.Region = @OrgID OR vw.HQ = @OrgID)
-- Get addi.onal data needed for sor.ng DECLARE @PreSortTable TABLE ( SHIP_DATE date.me NULL, CONTRACT_ID int NULL, DATE_OF_ENLIST date.me NULL, COMPONENT_CODE varchar(2) NULL, NWA_ID int NULL, PERSON_ID int NULL, RSS varchar(62) NULL, TIER varchar(5) NULL, PERSON_NAME varchar(62) NULL, SSN varchar(9) NULL, GENDER_CODE varchar(1) NULL, COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION varchar(50) NULL, DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION varchar(62) NULL, RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID int NULL, AFQT_SCORE INT NULL, MENTAL_GROUP varchar(5) NULL ) INSERT INTO @PreSortTable SELECT ..*, RTRIM(p.LAST_NAME) + SPACE(1) + RTRIM(p.FIRST_NAME) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, SPACE(0)), p.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, mc.GENDER_CODE, cc.COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION, sd.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION, RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID, null, null FROM @FilterTable . INNER JOIN PERSON p ON ..PERSON_ID = p.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE mc ON ..PERSON_ID = mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN NWA n on ..NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS cs ON cs.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = dbo.GetMaxStatusID(n.NWA_ID) INNER JOIN STATUS_DISPOSITION sd ON (CS.STATUS_TYPE = SD.STATUS_TYPE AND CS.STATUS_CODE = SD.STATUS_CODE AND CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = SD.DISPOSITION_CODE) INNER JOIN COMPONENT_CODE cc ON ..COMPONENT_CODE = cc.COMPONENT_CODE
--update presort table UPDATE @PreSortTable SET AFQT_SCORE = CA.AFQT_SCORE, MENTAL_GROUP = CASE WHEN(CA.AFQT_SCORE >= 93) THEN 'I' WHEN CA.AFQT_SCORE BETWEEN 65 AND 92 THEN 'II' WHEN CA.AFQT_SCORE BETWEEN 50 AND 64 THEN 'IIIA' WHEN CA.AFQT_SCORE BETWEEN 31 AND 49 THEN 'IIIB' WHEN CA.AFQT_SCORE BETWEEN 21 AND 30 THEN 'IV' END
FROM @PreSortTable preSortTable INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_ASVAB CA ON (preSortTable.PERSON_ID = CA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND CA.ASVAB_DATE = dbo.GetMaxASVABDate(CA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID))
-- Sort Data DECLARE @Sor.ngTable TABLE ( RowNumber int NULL, SHIP_DATE date.me NULL, CONTRACT_ID int NULL, DATE_OF_ENLIST date.me NULL, COMPONENT_CODE varchar(2) NULL, NWA_ID int NULL, PERSON_ID int NULL, RSS varchar(62) NULL, TIER varchar(5) NULL, PERSON_NAME varchar(62) NULL, SSN varchar(9) NULL, GENDER_CODE varchar(1) NULL, COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION varchar(50) NULL, DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION varchar(62) NULL, RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID int NULL, AFQT_SCORE INT NULL, MENTAL_GROUP varchar(5) NULL )
IF @SortBy = 1 INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By SHIP_DATE), pst.* FROM @PreSortTable pst ORDER BY SHIP_DATE IF @SortBy = 2 INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By PERSON_NAME), pst.* FROM @PreSortTable pst ORDER BY PERSON_NAME IF @SortBy = 3 INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By GENDER_CODE), pst.* FROM @PreSortTable pst ORDER BY GENDER_CODE IF @SortBy = 4 INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By DATE_OF_ENLIST), pst.* FROM @PreSortTable pst ORDER BY DATE_OF_ENLIST IF @SortBy = 5 INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By COMPONENT_CODE), pst.* FROM @PreSortTable pst ORDER BY COMPONENT_CODE IF @SortBy = 6 INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By RSS), pst.* FROM @PreSortTable pst ORDER BY RSS IF @SortBy = 7 INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION), pst.* FROM @PreSortTable pst ORDER BY DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION IF @SortBy = 8 INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By TIER), pst.* FROM @PreSortTable pst ORDER BY TIER IF @SortBy = 9 INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By MENTAL_GROUP), pst.* FROM @PreSortTable pst ORDER BY MENTAL_GROUP
-- Limit data to current page DECLARE @Grid TABLE ( RowNumber int NULL, SHIP_DATE date.me NULL, CONTRACT_ID int NULL, DATE_OF_ENLIST date.me NULL, COMPONENT_CODE varchar(2) NULL, NWA_ID int NULL, PERSON_ID int NULL, RSS varchar(62) NULL, TIER varchar(5) NULL, PERSON_NAME varchar(62) NULL, SSN varchar(9) NULL, GENDER_CODE varchar(1) NULL, COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION varchar(50) NULL, DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION varchar(62) NULL, RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID int NULL, AFQT_SCORE INT NULL, MENTAL_GROUP varchar(5) NULL, RECRUITER_NAME varchar(62) NULL )
INSERT INTO @Grid SELECT *, null FROM @Sor.ngTable WHERE RowNumber >= @star.ngRow AND RowNumber <= @LastRow
-- Get the last of the data needed for display UPDATE @Grid SET g.RECRUITER_NAME = p.[LAST_NAME] FROM @Grid g INNER JOIN PERSON p on p.PERSON_ID = g.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID
-- Return the data SELECT * FROM @Grid
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Sor.ngTable) AS Total, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Sor.ngTable WHERE COMPONENT_CODE = 'K5' AND GENDER_CODE = 'M') AS RegularMales, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Sor.ngTable WHERE COMPONENT_CODE = 'K5' AND GENDER_CODE = 'F') AS RegularFemales, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Sor.ngTable WHERE COMPONENT_CODE IN ('B5', 'K4', 'K8', 'K9') AND GENDER_CODE = 'M') AS ReserveMales, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Sor.ngTable WHERE COMPONENT_CODE IN ('B5', 'K4', 'K8', 'K9') AND GENDER_CODE = 'F') AS ReserveFemales, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @Sor.ngTable WHERE AFQT_SCORE >=50 AND COMPONENT_CODE = 'K5' AND GENDER_CODE = 'M') AS AlpahRegularMales
SET NOCOUNT OFF
